import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaPlus, FaMinus, FaTimes, FaDivide } from 'react-icons/fa'; // Impor ikon dari react-icons/fa import './index.css'; import Addition from './pages/Addition'; import Subtraction from './pages/Subtraction'; import Multiplication from './pages/Multiplication'; import Division from './pages/Division'; function App() { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Mendapatkan hook navigate untuk navigasi programatik // Fungsi untuk navigasi ke halaman yang sesuai const handleNavigate = (path) => { navigate(path); // Menavigasi ke path yang diberikan }; return (

Welcome to Math Operations

Choose an operation to perform:

{/* Navigasi tombol */}
{/* Mengarahkan ke halaman yang sesuai menggunakan Routes */}
} /> } /> } /> } /> } /> {/* Default route */}
); } export default App;
